roleset.name: destroy, kill
roleset.note: SPIKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'spike' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. No comparison, since I'm unsure of the meaning. (from spike.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: meaning?
example.text: At the same time [four of six design projects]-1 were spiked *trace*-1, he said.

example.text: [His jowls]-1 were spiked [*-1]by barbs of graying beard .

roles.note: This has more arguements than the verb. There ere many examples with a start and stop point and an extent (from spike.01-n)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: John's blood pressure spiked during his date with Mary.

example.name: with args 3 and 4
example.text: The spike from 1 basis point to 19 basis points

example.name: intransitive
example.text: In a week the hyacinths would spike out .
